keqe_expansions: Panama, a country located in Central America, is known for its famous Panama Canal, a crucial waterway that connects the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans. The Panama Canal plays a vital role in global maritime trade, allowing ships to bypass the lengthy journey around the southern tip of South America. In addition to its strategic location, Panama boasts a diverse range of ecosystems, from tropical rainforests to beautiful beaches. The capital city, Panama City, is a vibrant metropolis with a rich history and modern amenities. Overall, Panama offers a unique blend of natural beauty, cultural heritage, and economic significance on the world stage.

Panama is a country located in Central America, bordered by Costa Rica to the west and Colombia to the east. It is known for its famous Panama Canal, an engineering marvel that connects the Atlantic and Pacific Oceans. Panama boasts a rich history, with influences from indigenous tribes, Spanish conquerors, and later African slaves. The country is also renowned for its biodiversity, with lush rainforests, diverse wildlife, and stunning beaches. Panama City, the vibrant capital, is a metropolis where modern skyscrapers stand alongside colonial architecture. Visitors to Panama can explore historic sites, embark on eco-tours, or simply relax in the tropical paradise.
csqe_expansions: Panama The Kuna living in the San Blas drink a flavanol-rich cocoa as their main beverage, contributing more than 900 mg/day and thus probably have the most flavonoid-rich diet of any population. We used diagnosis on death certificates to compare cause-specific death rates from year 2000 to 2004 in mainland and the San Blas islands where only Kuna live. The Kuna Indians who reside in an archipelago on the Caribbean Coast of Panama have very low blood pressure levels, live longer than other Panamanians, and have a reduced frequency of myocardial infarction, stroke, diabetes mellitus, and cancer -- at least on their death certificates. One outstanding feature of their diet includes a very high intake of flavanol-rich cocoa.
